sourcesContent: import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-control-bar', templateUrl: './control-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./control-bar.component.css'] }) export class ControlBarComponent { public isUrlHome: boolean = false; public isUrlSearch: boolean = false; constructor(route: ActivatedRoute) { route.url.subscribe(url => { this.isUrlHome = url.join('/') === 'home'; }); route.url.subscribe(url => { this.isUrlSearch = url.join('/') === 'search'; }); } }
